infos.value: Dario, the prince of Hourne—the famed coward who has not once stepped foot onto the battlefield.
He was wedded to Muraga's daughter, Vinera, in a politically driven marriage.
Hourne and Fennes. Though a strong alliance between the two countries was in sight—
...That's the idea, anyway.
Gwahahaha! That's his best one yet!
Yeah. As expected of little Lord Tyrrell.
Are there others who can hold a conversation as well as you in Fennes?
Ah...m-maybe.
The people of Fennes come from such a dismal place, huh.
They seemed a bit hard to approach. But if they're like you, they'll get a warm welcome.
Yeah, like he said. It would be nice if the alliance really happens as expected.
Wh-who are you!?
Tyrrell, the time is now. Head for Dario's living room.
S-so it's time to assassinate Lord Dario...
...What are you saying?
Assassinate Lord Dario!?
Joking or not, what you've said is treasonous.
Treasonous, you say? How absurd.
If that's the case, come try me. Heh heh heh.
S-stop. These guys have nothing to do with it...
You're still saying soft things like that?
B-but...
You were the one to guide us shinobi to Hourne Castle. Is that not so?
Th-that's...
Tyrrell...is that the reality of it!?
You! You pretended to be an ally just to get close!
Despicable snakes!
You understand, right, Tyrrell? We of Fennes and those of Hourne are like oil and water.
If you don't kill them...you would let them kill you?
...R-right.
Let's go!
...I'm sorry, everyone.
But I won't fatally wound you, so please forgive me.
Ugh, urgh...
Tyrrell, what are you doing?
Ah... I-I'll be right there!
